name: com.unity.xr.openxr
description: OpenXR is an open, royalty-free standard developed by Khronos that aims to simplify AR/VR development by allowing developers to target a wide range of AR/VR devices. Use this plug-in to enable OpenXR in XR Plug-in Management.

samples.description: Basic sample showing how to create and reference OpenXR action maps with the new input system.
Shows a teapot mesh generated from native mesh subsystem with physics baked in background.
Demonstrates how to intercept an OpenXR method.
